title: The Only Job Changer in the World - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Jack of All Trades   Male Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong to Stronger   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World
author: Renkinou   錬金王
description:
Job hopper Amashiki Tsukasa made his way to the interview zone in order to change jobs, but as soon as he went past the door, he found himself in another world. When he checked the job section in his status window, it had ‘Job Changer’ written in it. It was the only job in this world that allowed the person to change to any kind job. After knowing its special characteristic, Tsukasa put all of his job hopping experience to work and decided to rise to the top of every single job in this other world.

This is the tale of a job hopper’s rising as a Job Changer in another world.>
